overview:
Serial start-up and property mitigation solution expert. Enjoys putting disruptive innovations in the hands of its certified members. Strong bias for upending the status quo.

About CDRG

The Canadian Disaster Restoration Group is the largest privately-held disaster restoration network in Canada. Its certified members complete over 20,000 insurance claims and property related mitigation projects annually. The CDRG network, has 1750 property damage experts, 150 service locations and earns over $275 million in combined annual revenues. These solutions have created a centralized property mitigation hub to serve our growing portfolio of insurance clients and commercial property owners.
